data.title: NATA 2024 – NATA Clinical Symposia & AT Expo
data.text:
We can’t wait to celebrate our 75th convention with you in New Orleans! The NATA Clinical Symposia & AT Expo is the premier live event for athletic trainers. The NATA convention offers important educational advances, career networking, social events, peer engagement opportunities and access to our AT Expo, which features the largest exhibition of athletic training products and services in the world.

Whether this is your first time visiting New Orleans or you’re a repeat visitor, the city’s invigorating spirit is sure to inspire, captivate and motivate.

Learn more about what the Crescent City has to offer and start crafting your perfect convention travel experience.

Attendees can earn up to 20 CEUs – 15 CEUs from the in-person convention, plus an additional 5 CEUs from never-before-seen sessions available on the NATA 2024 On-Demand platform. This content is exclusive to in-person attendees.

In-person attendees will have access to sessions in the NATA 2024 On-Demand platform, allowing them to earn their full 15 CEUs if they’re unable to do so while attending the in-person convention.

AT Expo will be open to all attendees June 26-27.

The NATA AT Expo is the world’s largest showcase of products and services for the athletic training profession. Exhibitors include all major manufacturers, distributors and service providers, allowing ATs to discover innovative technologies and demo new products.

Unopposed AT Expo hours allow you to enjoy demonstrations of products, shop for all your AT needs and learn about the newest offerings directly from exhibitors.
